alert.note: Alert for Waldo (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 5:59PM EDT until May 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WALDO COUNTY... At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thorndike, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Thorndike, Winterport, Unity, Prospect, Knox, Frankfort, Brooks, Jackson, Monroe, Troy and Swanville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
